attributes.review: i was using this when my phone glitches out and the screen went all green and then black. it won't turn on again and i took it to the shop and they said it broke. THIS APP BROKE MY NEW PHONE DONT, GET IT!!!!
attributes.title: it broke my phone

attributes.review: The second I downloaded this app my phone jumped out of my hands and proceeded to kill my pet hamster. My screen turned orange and kept repeating “make America great again” and now it’s on the loose on a killing spree. I would not recommend. 😌🦋💫🌸🧚🏻
attributes.title: DO NOT GET

attributes.review: It made my phone glitch so much and I don’t know if this is related or not but all of my apps randomly disappeared after downloading this app. 0/10 would not recommend
attributes.title: Terrible App

attributes.review: This app was my one chance to find hope in dear trumpie. but. there was none. It was beyond DISAPPOINTING. My heart aches for this country whos trying to take away our constitutional rights one by one because we hurt their feelings. sounds kinda ❄️❄️❄️ to me.
attributes.title: bad ☠️

attributes.review: Once I downloaded the app I didn’t realize how garbage it was going to be. I’m extremely infuriated at how low quality Mr. Trumps tan is that he resembles a rotten orange peel🍊. Anyway, in reality I came on here to talk about the toxic living standard Barron Trump has to face everyday. #savebarron from sissy orange man. 💜
attributes.title: Trump 🏳️🏳️2020

attributes.review: This app made my family get possessed by a demon, my cat die, and my dog get rabiesWho in their right mind would download this app This app also made my phone glitch out and my hand glitch out and when I was voting, my hand slipped and I accidentally VOTED FOR BIDEN whoops.
attributes.title: 🙈✨👸💆‍♀️

attributes.review: I don’t recommend this app at all!!!! This was the worst app I’ve ever download!! As soon as I opened the app it was all glitchy and slow!!! I then tried to get out the app AND IT CRASHED MY PHONE!!!! I would give this app a -123 if I could!
attributes.title: This app is Horrendous🧚🏽‍♀️✨

attributes.review: This app had my phone glitching and going all types of wrong. Also, it wasn’t a very helpful source to help me choose whether or not to vote for this hobo president it just made me want to vote for Bernie ugh waste of time.
attributes.title: This app is terrible

attributes.review: it made me phone shut off at random times and would send notifications like “action 327 was just sent to gov. comp. 24” so like idk if that means the app is watching us or not but it terrifying. do not get i meant like DONT!!!
attributes.title: worst app!!!

attributes.review: Donald Trump is a white suremacist. He created jobs, but so did Obama. His best year isn’t comparable to Obamas. Not saying I liked Obama too but he hasn’t made america great again. He had four years, and he still hasn’t done any of that.
attributes.title: Disgusting
